HELPLET_DATE:
Enter the date in one of the standardized formats. For example:
  • 24 June 1962
  • June 1962
  • 1962
  • About 1962
  • Before 1962
  • After 1962
  • Between 1961 and 1962
HELPLET_DATE_LEARN_WHAT_TITLE_TEXT: Learn what to do when you do not know an exact date.
HELPLET_PLACE:
Enter the place in a standardized format. For example:
  • Rochdale, Lancashire, England
  • Bordeaux, France
  • Brazil
HELPLET_PLACE_LEARN_HOW_TITLE_TEXT: Learn how to recommend an addition or correction to standardized places.
HELPLET_STANDARDIZED_DATE: If the standardized date is wrong or blank, select a standard that best matches the date you entered.
HELPLET_STANDARDIZED_PLACE: If the standardized place is wrong or blank, select a standard that best matches the place you entered.
